snippet.title: MageLoop Zephyrus Dragon
snippet.description:
When you walk into a hall with a sleeping dragon. Better not wake him up with a noise...

Zephyrus is a fantasy adventure VR game in its very early stages, from a small indie team. You are one mage among many who wants to escape this mystical world. You can do this alone or in cooperation with companions. 

Supported platforms:
Oculus Quest, Oculus Quest 2, Oculus Rift S, HTC Vive, and Windows Mixed Reality

Language localization:
English, 中文, Brasil, Deutsch, Español, Français, Italiano, 日本, Magyar, Polski, Русский, Svenska

Teaser 🢂 https://youtu.be/UyR427gNZ-k

The Pre-Alpha version can be downloaded here:
Oculus AppLab 🢂https://www.oculus.com/experiences/quest/3903308463118518/?utm_source=applabdb.com
SideQuest 🢂https://sidequestvr.com/app/4438/zephyrus
itch.io 🢂https://mageloop.itch.io/zephyrus

Q & A from the developers 🢂 https://mageloop.com/QandA/

You can follow the progress of the game here:
Facebook 🢂 https://www.facebook.com/MageLoop-106736921488287
Twitter 🢂 https://twitter.com/LoopMage?s=20
Discord (ComicBook) 🢂 https://discord.gg/jMfbBCtz
MageLoop 🢂 https://mageloop.com/
